donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
outputs.output_descr:
Revised Outputs following the Project Steering Committee Meeting on 22 November 2011:
1. Partners are equipped to design and implement evidence-based GBV prevention campaigns
2. Selected government, civil society and UN advocates in the region are equipped with enhanced capacities to implement initiatives for GBV prevention  
3. Government, civil society and UN advocates gain access to regional knowledge resources and evidence-based policy tools for gender-based violence  prevention 

Original Outputs:
1) Public awareness campaigns mobilising boys and men for GBV prevention implemented at the regional national and local levels, 2) Selected government, civil society and UN advocates in the region are equipped with enhanced capacities to implement initiatives working with boys and men for GBV prevention, 3) Government, civil society and UN advocates gain access to regional knowledge resources and evidence-based policy tools on working with boys and men for gender-based violence  prevention

project_descr: Partners for Prevention: Working with Boys and Men to Prevent Gender-Based Violence
